definition: to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Long span cable-stayed bridge is one of the most important modem bridge types.
sentences.chinese: 大跨度斜拉桥是现代桥梁最具竞争力的桥型之一。

sentences.english: Large-span suspended-dome was adopted in Ji nan Olympic Center Gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 济南奥体中心体育馆采用大跨度弦支穹顶结构。

sentences.english: The control for wind-induced vibration of long-span bridges was studied in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究大跨度桥梁风致振动控制。

sentences.english: The Vista is equipped with large stabilizers & control surfaces for excellent handling and low speed controllability (elevator & stabilizer span is carefully matched to wing span).
sentences.chinese: 大跨度，高展弦比机翼提供优异攀登性能。

sentences.english: Square timber joists form the base layer and are laid across the span of the structure.
sentences.chinese: 方木搁栅形成的基础层，是整个结构的跨度奠定。

sentences.english: My musical taste is so across the board.
sentences.chinese: 我对音乐的口味跨度很广。

sentences.english: The steel roof structure of a gymnasium is a kind of large span string-dome structure system.
sentences.chinese: 某体育馆钢屋盖为大跨度弦支穹顶结构。

sentences.english: The bridge crosses the river in a single span .
sentences.chinese: 河上那座桥是个单跨度桥。

sentences.english: The raters ranged in age from 18 to more than 70.
sentences.chinese: 评分者的年龄跨度从18岁至70岁以上。

sentences.english: This plugin provides a Gantt-like Timespan view.
sentences.chinese: 这个插件提供类似甘特图的时间跨度视图。

sentences.english: The longer the forecast horizon, the more uncertain it is.
sentences.chinese: 预测的时间跨度越长，不确定性也就越强。

sentences.english: Xiangyun the concept of a culture in China with thousands of time-span.
sentences.chinese: 祥云文化概念在中国具有上千年时间跨度。

sentences.english: Research on the wind-resistant design methods of long-span roofs.
sentences.chinese: 大跨度屋盖围护结构的设计风荷载研究。

sentences.english: Zhang ailing' reception history has long time and big span.
sentences.chinese: 张爱玲的接受历史时间长，跨度大。

sentences.english: Analysis on static wind response and ultimate carrying capacity of long-span roofs.
sentences.chinese: 大跨度屋盖结构的静风效应及静风极限承载力分析。

sentences.english: Dual trackway makes the transverse span also large.
sentences.chinese: 双股道使横向跨度也大。

definition: to span/to stretch across/to travel across
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span
drop in elevation/(fig.) gap (in wages, expectations etc)/disparity
the units place (or column) in the decimal system
time-consuming/to take a period of (x amount of time)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
